channel.title: Mastermind Died N1 while being debauched
channel.description:
N1 Mastermind died at the same time as I debauched him. Somehow we both died (and no one else). Mastermind did not claim he was possessed and no one could figure out how this happened.
MM should have night immunity and debauch should have protected (I would think)
:

item.title: Mastermind Died N1 while being debauched
item.dc:creator: BigBenBoulevard
item.description:
While that is a possibility, it is still unlikely as the MM didn’t know how he died. If he had gotten happy houred he would have gotten a message telling him so.

Read full topic
item.source: Mastermind Died N1 while being debauched

item.title: Mastermind Died N1 while being debauched
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
MM was still OCC Immune at that time. And HH was the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Mastermind Died N1 while being debauched
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
I don’t mean to be rude @NuclearBurrito, but I think this thread is discussing an older patch of the game when Drunk’s Debauch caused all the visitors to their target to be redirected to them.

Read full topic
item.source: Mastermind Died N1 while being debauched

item.title: Mastermind Died N1 while being debauched
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
2nd drunk HH him and then he gets killed by NK? You could have just been killed by assassin or Yolo bomb

Also isn’t MM Occ immune?

Read full topic

item.title: Mastermind Died N1 while being debauched
item.dc:creator: BigBenBoulevard
item.description:
The MM did not leave the game until after his death. I talked with him in dead chat and he also did not know how it happened.

Read full topic
